venueName: The Watch Rooftop Kitchen and Spirits

pages.text:
[Page Title: Event Space Charleston, SC | The Watch Rooftop]

Skip to content 
Event Space Charleston, SC

EVENT SPACE IN CHARLESTON
With spaces designed to inspire, flexible indoor outdoor options and expansive aerial views of downtown Charleston, The Watch is the ideal rooftop venue for your next event or gathering. Get to know our unique spaces, made for bringing people together. 
For large parties of 10-20 guests, please . For private events for 20+ guests, click the link below to fill out the inquiry form and connect with our Sales Team.
email us Start Planning 
The Observatory
Our dedicated dining room with brand new soft seating and modular tables has endless configurations and is perfectly appointed to host celebrations of any kind, including Rehearsal Dinners, Welcome Brunches, Farewell Lunches, Bridal and Baby Showers, Retirement Parties, Graduations, and Corporate Events. Comfortably accommodates 42 or a reception for up to 60 people using both interior and exterior spaces. 600 Square Feet with views of downtown Charleston, the Ravenel Bridge & the Cooper River Request A Proposal 
The Observatory Terrace
The Observatory Terrace, just off our main dining room, provides an intimate setting for smaller groups; perfect for seated Breakfast, Brunch, Lunch or Dinner, or Cocktail Receptions. Accommodates 16 guests seated; 25 guests standing. 400+ Square Feet of Breezy Outdoor Space Overlooking Downtown Charleston + Attractions Request A Proposal 
Communal Table
Book one of our live-edge communal tables adjacent to our craft cocktail bar for a fun, dedicated option for smaller groups. Communal Tables seat up to 8 guests and are perfect for Corporate Lunches and smaller celebrations. Make A Reservation 
The Watch Buyout
When it’s more space and privacy you desire, The Watch Rooftop Kitchen & Spirits is available for full buyouts for celebrations of any kind. With access to our XX -seat bar, communal tables, dual rooftop spaces, and full dining room, The Watch is the premier rooftop venue for events in Charleston. Full buyouts of The Watch Rooftop accommodate up to 150 Guests. 2,100+ dedicated, private event space with 2 Rooftop Terraces and 360 Views of downtown Charleston Request A Proposal 
Get On The List

Sign up for our monthly newsletter to stay up to date on the latest happenings, seasonal specialities, and epicurean events at The Watch.
Submit

WELCOME TO THE WATCH ROOFTOP

Your culinary introduction to Charleston begins here. Made with locally sourced ingredients, each of our dishes combines Lowcountry tradition with authentic Southern flair at all meals of the day.
Make a Reservation Get Directions 
Located on the 7th floor of The Restoration Hotel, our rooftop restaurant offers a soulful menu showcasing a bounty of locally sourced ingredients, all while taking in a breathtaking panorama of Charleston’s architectural history.

GROUPS + EVENTS

Bringing People Together

Perched atop The Restoration Hotel, The Observatory and The Observatory Terrace offer sweeping views of the city and Charleston Harbor. Our open floor plan makes it perfect for an intimate seated dinner celebration or a more casual cocktail reception.
View our Event Spaces Request a Proposal 
THE RISE COFFEE BAR

Coffee is Served

Stop in and try classic brews and seasonal sips at the most Instagram-able coffee shop in Charleston. In collaboration with our exclusive coffee partner Foresight Coffee Roasters, we’ve created an exclusive blend roasted solely for our guests.

[Page Title: Wine Bar in Charleston, SC | The Watch Rooftop]

Skip to content 
Wine Bar in Charleston, SC

Sip Wine at a Rooftop Bar in Charleston, SC

Nestled atop the vibrant streets of downtown Charleston, The Watch Rooftop Kitchen & Spirits stands out as a premier wine bar in Charleston, SC, offering an unparalleled wine menu. With a wide selection of wines from around the world, our guests can explore the rich flavors of renowned wine regions from the comfort of our rooftop bar in Charleston. From the crisp bubbles of a Cava from Spain to the robust notes of a Cabernet Sauvignon from Napa Valley, our wine list is carefully curated to please every palate. Ideal for those seeking a sophisticated evening out, our rooftop restaurant provides the perfect backdrop for wine lovers and novices alike to experience wine tasting Charleston SC. As one of the top downtown Charleston restaurants, we offer not just exceptional wines but also breathtaking views, making every sip an unforgettable experience. Join us at The Watch, where the art of wine meets the beauty of Charleston under the stars.

[Page Title: Lunch in Charleston, SC | The Watch Rooftop]

Skip to content 
Lunch in Charleston, SC

Lunch in Charleston Served Monday through Saturday 11am to 4pm

The Watch Rooftop Kitchen & Spirits brings together the best of food in Charleston with a stellar lunch menu that captures the essence of rooftop dining in the heart of downtown. As a standout for lunch in Charleston SC, our menu features an array of choices from Grilled Chicken & Pimento Cheese Nachos to Skillet Mac & Cheese, crafted to satisfy every taste. Available Monday to Saturday from 11 am to 4 pm, we provide the perfect lunch spot for those seeking a memorable meal amidst the charm of downtown Charleston restaurants. With our unique rooftop setting, guests can enjoy not just the flavors of their food, but also the panoramic views that set us apart from other Charleston lunch spots. Visit The Watch for a lunch experience that combines the delights of rooftop restaurants Charleston SC with the vibrancy of downtown dining.

THE WATCH FAVORITES

[Page Title: Best Cocktails in Charleston, SC]

Skip to content 
Best Cocktails in Charleston, SC

Charleston Cocktails at a Rooftop Bar Downtown

The Watch Rooftop Kitchen & Spirits is renowned for crafting some of the best cocktails in Charleston, offering guests an innovative menu that blends creativity with the finest ingredients. Highlights include the “Pebbles & Bamm Bamm” and “Romero’s Bad Habit,” served in an atmosphere that only a rooftop bar in Charleston can provide. With panoramic views of the city, this restaurant stands among the best rooftop bars in Charleston, elevating the cocktail experience to new heights. Positioned as a premier destination among downtown Charleston restaurants, The Watch attracts both locals and visitors looking for exceptional cocktails Charleston SC. From the invigorating “Dreaming of the Sea” to the bold “Southern Harvest,” the cocktail offerings are designed to be memorable. This makes The Watch not just a place for drinks but a top choice for experiencing the best of rooftop bars in Charleston.

[Page Title: Happy Hour in Charleston | The Watch Rooftop]

Skip to content 
Happy Hour in Charleston

Happy Hour in Charleston

Mon-Thurs | 4-7 PM

Welcome to Sunset Hour at The Watch Rooftop, the ultimate destination for the best happy hour in Charleston. Located atop downtown, our rooftop restaurant pairs breathtaking views with a unique twist on the classic happy hour experience. Enjoy our signature cocktails and delectable snacks, from Cheeseburger Sliders to truffle-fries, all designed for sharing and savoring. As a place where good times and great food meet spectacular views, The Watch Rooftop Bar and Restaurant is more than just a spot for a drink; it’s where every visit becomes a memorable occasion.  Join us for sunset hour and discover why we’re celebrated as the best happy hour in Charleston, offering a unique blend of ambiance, culinary creativity, and panoramic views.
The Restoration Hotel 
Sunset Hour Specials
